about_info: The Grandaddy of Gifts That Keep on GivingBud BasicsCrafting together two strains of polar opposites could have been a recipe for disaster, but insteadGrandaddy Bruce Feminizedis an exemplary example of perfectly balanced Indica and Sativa effects.Grandaddy Purple, one of the most popular strains on the West Coast, brings her vivid color and flavor genetics to the table to combine withBruce Bannerâ€™s sweet THC content and creative buzz. The resulting strain is insanely potent, with delicious warm notes of spicy vanilla that set the mouth watering and the mind wandering soon after taking a toke.With THC levels that are phenomenal even in their lowest range (between 26% and 28% THC content), cannabis consumers can expect a high thatâ€™s clean and cerebral, providing a soaring buzz that sends the mind into the stratosphere before gently lulling you into a blanket of comfort and relaxation, where the body can melt into sleep.SinceGrandaddy Bruceâ€™s body high is of the pain-relieving variety, this is a popular specimen in the medicinal community for users who require analgesics and anti-inflammatories. Ensuring peaceful tranquility, these buds are also an effective relief for a variety of mental health struggles due to the sense of all-round wellbeing youâ€™re left with after smoking a joint.Cultivating an all-fem crop is a breeze withGrandaddy Bruce Feminized, as sheâ€™s a small and sturdy Indica strain that practically cares for herself. A warm and bright environment is all you need to find yourself with a 500 to 600 gram yield after just 8 to 10 weeks of flowering.Flavor and Fragrance of Grandaddy BruceDefinitely a dessert strain,Grandaddy Bruceis heady with a sweet, earthy grape scent that becomes more floral and vanilla leaning the long you inhale the aroma. Warm and calming, the taste is similar and yet more musky, bringing a spiciness to the flavor that is both delicious and decidedly moreish.EffectsWhen THC levels are this high, expectations are high too - and you wonâ€™t be disappointed withGrandaddy Bruce Fem, as these psychoactive effects are both intense and unforgettably immense.Within moments of taking a toke, you can expect exaltation and euphoria to hit as one, boosting the mind up into the stratosphere and clear past the clouds of gloom and worry into the starry sky. Inviting you immediately into chatterbox territory, youâ€™ll find yourself far more talkative than usual, which of course makes this strain a great choice for sharing with friends and social gatherings.When the cerebral high has settled a little,Grandaddy Bruceâ€™s soothing Indica influence will creep up to relax your whole body, wiping away stress and fatigue by loosening taut muscles and limbs. As your body slowly softens, youâ€™ll begin to feel your consciousness melting away into a peaceful, deep sleep of soothing dreams.Potent as she is,Grandaddy Bruce Femis a strain that you have to consume with caution, as even in low doses these buds can leave you with bloodshot, dry eyes and cottonmouth. This can be remedied by drinking plenty of fluids before, during and after smoking, but some larger doses will trigger bouts of paranoia and anxiety.Medical Uses of Grandaddy Bruce FeminizedAilments of the body and mind can be relieved with ease due toGrandaddy Bruce Femâ€™s potent therapeutic benefits, combining a cocktail of cannabinoids,terpenesandflavonoidsto create a blend that offers relief from more concerns that you can count.Along with her euphoric head-high, this strain is notable for the anti-depressant and anxiolytic properties present in her make-up that serve to calm and still the rough waters of depression and anxiety. By regulating and balancing the levels of neurotransmitters and receptors in the brain,Grandaddy Brucerestores order to the synapses and reduces levels ofcortisolto reduce stress.Due to her fast-acting anti-inflammatory and analgesic effects, temporary relief from severe pains such as sciatica,migrainesand arthritis can be found in just a hit or two ofGrandaddy Bruce Fem, without the unpleasant negative side effects of traditionally prescribed medicines.Since this strain is also effective at suspending nausea and vomiting, a toke of this stuff will do a great deal for your appetite, since the flavor will get your mouth watering and the munchies you're left with will have you craving a hearty meal in no time. Those with eating disorders or chemotherapy patients struggling with alack of appetitewill find great solace in this strain.The relaxing effects ofGrandaddy Brucecan also be put to great use for those unable to sleep or suffering from insomnia, as the body-stone and couchlock sensation that accompanies this high is excellent for ushering forth some well-needed slumber.Growing Grandaddy Bruce FeminizedWith growth traits that lean heavily on Indica roots,Grandaddy Bruce Feminizedis a small and sturdy strain thatâ€™s both bushy and compact in one, unlikely to grow above 110cm at the very most.New growers and those with more experience will delight in the effortless cultivation of this strain, since sheâ€™s simple and straightforward to deal with - just how we like it! Growing her indoors,Grandaddy Brucewill thrive in a temperature range of 21Â° to 26Â°C, and prefers a humidity level between the 40% and 50% mark. If you want to encourage multiple budding sites on the plant, we highly recommend topping early and trimming the fan leaves to discourage the build-up of moisture and subsequently, mold.Employing aSea of Green(SoG) technique is a great idea if youâ€™re wanting to maximize light exposure and space, and will nicely boost plant productivity, provided you keep it to 16 plants or under per square meter. Cramming in too many plants into too small of a space will only increase moisture retention and invite pathogens, which will be detrimental to growth.When fully grown,Grandaddy Bruce Femis a particularly attractive plant, nicely packing dark, cone-shaped buds that hint at plum colors, and are coated in orange pistils. Keeping these plants well-fed is crucial, but if you do you can expect 8 to 9 weeks of flowering to leave you with 600 grams of sticky, resin-coated nugs per plant.If you happen to be blessed with a dry and sunny climate, growing this hybrid outdoors is a reasonable alternative, asGrandaddy Brucecan certainly achieve her potential under the sunlight, and yield a tasty 500 grams around mid-October.SummaryA perfectly tuned and balanced hybrid of exceptional origins,Grandaddy Bruce Feminizedis a wonder strain of soaring cerebral highs and peaceful tranquility, full of moreish, dessert-like flavor.Bursting with a heady, sweet, grape-like aroma that only amplifies the warm vanilla spice taste she leaves on your tongue, this strain is more than just palatable - sheâ€™s downright delicious. Certainly a strain for enjoying after dinner or in the early evening as a treat for the tastebuds and all the senses.For recreational use,Grandaddy Bruce Femis a gift that keeps on giving, first lifting you to exaltation by boosting the mind and the mood, then lowering you on a cloud of euphoria into a body-buzz that soothes and unwinds the body until youâ€™re little more than a melted mess of chill and relaxation.Since the head-high of this hybrid is particularly potent, sheâ€™s a strain that can be put to great use by medicinal marijuana users who are searching for relief from depression, anxiety and stress, or physical ailments such as arthritis and sciatica.GrowingGrandaddy Bruceis a dream since her Indica structure makes her hardy and resilient enough for even new growers to get along nicely. Small and beautiful, keeping her environment optimal is key, but once she flourishes youâ€™ll find immense satisfaction in her leafy fluffiness and spade-shaped nugs, gorgeous in dark green and purple, with long, thin orange pistils and a frosty layer of sticky trichomes. Harvest and cure her well, and you can expect a healthy 500 grams to enjoy per plant.  Cannabis affects everyone differently. Your experience with this strain may not be the same as someone elseâ€™s. Growing conditionsâ€”including light, nutrients, and pot sizeâ€”play a major role in shaping the plantâ€™s yield, potency, and flavor profile. Results will always vary based on how and where itâ€™s grown.

A Pure Indica History LessonBud BasicsAfghanhas been released and re-released in all manner of weird and wonderful forms over the years. One of the most popular choices for growers beingAfghan Feminized, an all-time superstar strain thatâ€™s all choice and no compromise.With her origins firmly rooted in the Middle East,Afghancannabis has been enjoyed in one form or another for centuries. Thereâ€™s a time and place for high-techhybridsand sophisticated cannabis cocktails, butAfghan Feminizedis just about as untouched and untainted as it gets. Admittedly, aside from the fact that this version has been engineered to ensure 100%female plants, 100% of the time.Across the board, this iconic beauty is everything youâ€™d expect a quality Indica to be. On the nose, itâ€™s the classic spicy, peppery and hash-like fragrance that immediately sends you on a sensory magic carpet ride.This strainâ€™s 100% pure Indica genetics guarantee an almostexclusively physical stone, which nonetheless brings a welcome dose of euphoria into the mix. THC levels hover around the 20% mark, though often test as high as 25%.Afghan Feminizedis also notorious for producing Biblical quantities of resin, making her perfect for DIY extracts andhashproduction. A strain thatâ€™s worthy of her position among the all-time greats,Afghanâ€™sgenetics are the reason we have strains likeBlueberry, Northern Lightsand dozens of other modern classics.Best of all, as long as you can provide your plants with relatively warm and stable conditions, these lovely ladies can be an absolute gift to grow. Even where space is at a premium this stuff produces like itâ€™s a competition.Flavor and Fragrance of AfghanThe three primary terpenes inAfghan Feminizedare myrcene (herbal), pinene (pine) and ocimene (minty).On the nose, thereâ€™s an immediate and enticing hash-like fragrance, with plenty of peppery spice and exotic incense. All of which bursts into life when the buds are broken â€“ even more so when ignited.Thereâ€™s much to be said for the subtler flavors brought out via vaporization, but this is a classic, 100% old-school strain thatâ€™s best smokedâ€¦ period.That said, the flavor is a little on the harsh side and the sharpness of the smoke can have a drying effect on the throat and mouth. Again, this isnâ€™t a sophisticated strain engineered to please â€“ itâ€™s apure and unspoiled specimen, exactly as nature intended. Besides, a little heat and harshness on the throat is a small price to pay for what follows.EffectsThis stuff is, quite simply, as good as Indica weed gets. Itâ€™s no coincidenceAfghanhas become the yardstick by which all other Indicas are measured. Nor was it purely by chance that this special landrace was selected by many of the worldâ€™s most successful breeders over the years when working on their latest hybrids.Afghanis the dictionary definition of everything an Indica strain should be. One or two puffs into the experience, you begin feeling wave after wave of warming tingles making their way through the body. The feeling of heaviness grows until you can barely lift a finger, by which point couch-lock sets in and youâ€™re down for the duration.WithAfghan Feminized, however, youâ€™re not confined to a puddle of fogginess and delirium while the body stone does its thing. Thereâ€™s a deep and intoxicating sense of blissful contentment throughout the entire ride, enabling you to soak up your surroundings and enjoy every second of it.Optimism, positivity and good old-fashioned happiness accompany the sense ofcomplete incapacitation. The only problem being that when the munchies set in (and they will), you might not even have the strength to lift your phone and order a takeout. Hence, youâ€™ll want to plan in advance to avoid this potential nightmare scenario.Medical Uses of Afghan FeminizedMedical marijuana users rave about thefantastic pain-relieving propertiesofAfghan. Quickly getting to work on the entire body with a numbing effect, this is one of the most popular therapeutic strains available for rapid and long-lasting pain relief. Sheâ€™s also great for getting to grips with muscle aches, stiffness, headaches and migraines.Sleep disorders are also no match for this stuff, which in most instances guarantees an exceptional nightâ€™s sleep. One thatâ€™s never followed by the kind of drowsiness and fogginess youâ€™d normally associate with a tranquilizing strain.Afghanâ€™sconnections with the munchies also make her great for tackling bouts of poor appetite, or dealing with nausea.Mild mood issues and everyday stress can also be tackled with the carefully measured intake of these nugs. We say â€˜carefully measuredâ€™ for the simple reason that one toke too many and youâ€™re completely out of action â€“ which may not be your intention.Afghanisnâ€™t known for a tendency to trigger unpleasant side effects, though the intensity of the physical stone can be somewhat overwhelming for novice users. As the THC content of this remarkable strain varies so wildly, itâ€™s best to err on the side of caution and start out slowly.Growing Afghan FeminizedGrowingAfghan Feminizedat home is a relatively simple ride. Itâ€™s best to keep things indoors if youâ€™re not in a warm Mediterranean-like region, but youâ€™ll not be needing a great deal of space for these ladies to do their thing.Youâ€™ll be looking at plants that rarely reach more than 1 meter in height, making these ladies ideal for making use of quiet corners around the home.Short, stocky anddependable for generous yields,Afghan Femplants need only an occasional prune to maintain good air circulation and prevent mold. Quality soil will see you netting just as impressive results as a more advanced cultivation process, so donâ€™t be afraid to keep things simple. 500g for every square meter of grow space is about the average, though can be taken further in ideal outdoor conditions.Physically hiding these tiny plants from sight is easy â€“ camouflaging their stink when they begin flowering is an altogether different matter.SummaryReferring back to an earlier point, thereâ€™s a time and a place for complex and sophisticated cannabis thatâ€™s been precision-engineered with a specific purpose in mind. Thereâ€™s also a time for taking things back to basics and enjoying weed as it has been enjoyed throughout the history of mankind.In the case of the latter,Afghanreally is in a league of her own. Pure, untainted and unspoiled, this is everything an Indica should be. Plus, given the fact that sheâ€™s so simple to grow, thereâ€™s really no excuse fornotmaking this legend a part of your permanent collection.  Cannabis affects everyone differently. Your experience with this strain may not be the same as someone elseâ€™s. Growing conditionsâ€”including light, nutrients, and pot sizeâ€”play a major role in shaping the plantâ€™s yield, potency, and flavor profile. Results will always vary based on how and where itâ€™s grown.

Close Encounters of the Kush KindBud BasicsTrue to her name, Alien OG Feminized promises a downright extraterrestrial experience. One of the most beautifully balanced hybrids youâ€™ll ever lay your hands on, this herb lulls you into a false sense of security with her blissful fragrance and flavor. Only to then propel you into a distant galaxy with mind-blowing potency - often as high as 28% THC.Alien OG was brought to life by combining the genetics of Tahoe OG Kush and Alien Kush. An amalgamation which (as is often the case) resulted in a strain far more than the sum of its parts - a perfectly balanced 50/50 hybrid, with an equal Indica and Sativa composition.Hailing from the Bay Area of California, Alien OG Feminized is the kind of strain you reach for when you simply want to get as high as possible as quickly as possible.Thereâ€™s no messing around with this stuff - she hits like an out-of-control freight train and continues hitting for hours on end. Not that itâ€™s a one-dimensional experience - the fragrance and flavor profile is no less than dreamy. Itâ€™s just that unless you know exactly what youâ€™re doing, thereâ€™s a good chance these buds will prove to be more than you can handle.If youâ€™re yet to find a strain that puts your legendary THC tolerance to the test, Alien OG could be the â€˜one hit and quitâ€™ specimen youâ€™ve been searching for.Flavor and Fragrance of Alien OG FeminizedOn the nose, this herb gets to work with a surprisingly delicate and immensely inviting citrus fragrance. Her primary terpene composition comprises generous quantities of myrcene, caryophyllene and limonene, which come together to create a herbal-lemon fragrance with punches of peppery spice in the background. All of which is propelled to an entirely higher level when the buds are broken, at which time a wave of wet earth and quality Skunk is released.Flavor-wise, Alien OG delivers all youâ€™d expect and plenty more besides. Her sharp citrus flavors are complimented by plenty of pine freshness, underpinned by a hash-like aftertaste that lingers on the palate for hours.The smoke produced is thick, rich and satisfying, yet surprisingly smooth with an almost buttery quality - further boosting that false sense of security, offering a smoothness of smoke that provides no indication of whatâ€™s to follow.EffectsThe potential potency of Alien OG Feminized is often evident in the shimmering coating of crystal-white trichomes covering the buds. Mature plants often have an alien-like beauty to them that makes for magnificent bag appeal.In any case, you wonâ€™t know whether youâ€™re looking at 20% batch or a 28% batch until you get busy with it. Hence, the first couple of tokes should be approached with due care and caution.The exact opposite of a creeper, Alien OG gets to work instantaneously with an energizing upliftthat borders on overpowering. The initial stages of the high are almost exclusively cerebral, often transporting the user into a state of almost dumbfounded euphoria.Shortly after, the Indica genetics begin doing their thing, as a warm and relaxing body stone creeps through the extremities. Not to such an extent as to glue you to the couch, but powerful enough to bring on extended bouts of laziness. Youâ€™ll still be able to move, but you probably wonâ€™t want to. That is, unless you go OTT, in which case a prolonged bout of couch-lock is inevitable.Whatâ€™s most enjoyable about Alien OG is how even after youâ€™ve been dealt a body blow, you still benefit from complete mental clarity and sharpness. Creative thinking and inspiration hit in waves, alongside the optimism and positivity you need to soak up your surroundings and enjoy every moment of the experience.Prolonged cases of the munchies are to be expected, so plan ahead to ensure you donâ€™t have to move too far. Hydration is also an absolute must when enjoying these buds, which often bring on red-eye and dry-mouth like youâ€™ve never experienced before.Medical Uses of Alien OG FeminizedThe fantastically balanced nature of Alien OG makes for an outstanding therapeutic strain, with a long list of potential medical applications. This is the kind of strain that can be anything you want her to be, depending on how much you consume and your THC tolerance.For example, the cerebral aspect of the high is perfect for getting to grips with depression, anxiety, ADHD and PTSD. Itâ€™s also great for combating bouts of stress and anxiety, or for simply providing a dose of inspiration and motivation when feeling lazy and lethargic. A few tokes and youâ€™re back at your best, grinning at all thatâ€™s good in the world.On the physical side of things, Alien OG provides the kind of warm and relaxing body stone thatâ€™s great for treating mild to moderate aches and pains. This herbâ€™s also been said to work wonders against headaches, migraines and muscle stiffness, and her associations with the munchies make for a good choice to combat nausea and bouts of poor appetite, with the clear-headedness needed not to make terrible dietary choices at the time.In high enough doses, Alien OG can eventually bring on a state of physical relaxation so intense that it lulls the users into a deep and restful nightâ€™s sleep. Though itâ€™s worth bearing in mind that the initial stages of the high are the exact opposite of relaxing, so be cautious when hitting this THC-heavy strain hard.Growing Alien OG Feminized SeedsAs for cultivation, Alien OG really is a gift from above. This being the feminized version, problematic male plants are practically eliminated from the equation. Youâ€™ll be looking at exclusively female plants in your grow space, which rarely reach heights in excess of 1m and are reasonably easy to grow.Balanced temperatures and humidity levels hold the key to the best possible yields, as does a decent amount of pruning to ensure good air circulation. Flowering times are relatively short at around eight weeks on average, after which you could be looking at anything up to 12oz of weed for every square meter of grow space. Pretty impressive when considering Alien OGâ€™s potential THC content of up to 28%.If youâ€™re dealing with limited space and can only stretch to one or two plants, a little of this stuff goes a seriously long way.Outdoor yields can be even more impressive, but only where conditions are consistently warm, sunny and relatively stable. Otherwise, itâ€™s best to keep Alien OG Feminized indoors.SummaryBoth for recreational and therapeutic cannabis users alike, Alien OG raises the bar in terms of balance and potency.Relatively easy to grow and capable of producing more THC than youâ€™ll know what to do with, this herb also impresses with enticing aromas and fabulous citrus flavors.Novice smokers and those with a low THC tolerance are advised to approach this cannabis with caution, however, as the initial stages of the high in particular can be quite overwhelming. A certain amount of mind-race is to be expected, so think twice if youâ€™ve a history of panic attacks or paranoia.Otherwise, Alien OG Fem could be just the thing to test your mettle - if youâ€™re the type that enjoys a challenge!  Cannabis affects everyone differently. Your experience with this strain may not be the same as someone elseâ€™s. Growing conditionsâ€”including light, nutrients, and pot sizeâ€”play a major role in shaping the plantâ€™s yield, potency, and flavor profile. Results will always vary based on how and where itâ€™s grown.

Big, Green, Fruity and FeminineBud BasicsThis hulking great specimen of a strain has been doing her thing for some time now, yet continues to top the table as one of the most monstrous hybrids ever concocted.Like Marvelâ€™s Incredible Hulk, the Bruce Banner Feminized strain is green, grows to a towering height and has enough strength to blast you into the middle of next week. However seasoned you consider yourself to be, 27% THC is more than most can handle.Whatâ€™s interesting is how this cannabis combines frankly terrifying potency with a delicate, aromatic and downright delicious flavor profile.Youâ€™d expect these buds to reek of nothing but old-school Skunk and head-spinning dankness, but itâ€™s actually more of a floral and fruity affair. One that belies the potency and intensity of the high to follow, which never fails to catch novice smokers off guard.The genetic composition of Bruce Banner Feminized is relatively well balanced, coming in at around 60% Sativa and 40% Indica genetics. This is pretty much right on the money as far as the high goes, which propels you into a world of pure fantasy before delivering one hell of a body blow. All of which adds up to a hugely enjoyable and versatile strain, with a long list of potential therapeutic applications.If all that wasnâ€™t enough, this herb has the potential to be as generous in terms of yields as she is in potency. This being the feminized version, problematic male plants are eliminated from the equation.Bruce Banner Fem needs some serious headspace to reach her full potential, but is nonetheless capable of producing more than 30oz of weed for every square meter of grow space. Which is (for most people at least) way more than youâ€™ll be needing for quite some time to come.Flavor and Fragrance of Bruce Banner FeminizedThe most prominent terpenes in Bruce Banner are myrcene, caryophyllene and limonene respectively. Produced by combining the genetics of OG Kush and Strawberry Diesel, this hybrid delivers more or less exactly what you would expect on the nose. Plenty of fresh fruits and sweet berry fragrances, with a heavy undertone of diesel and a classic Skunk punch.Break the buds open and the heavy diesel fragrance becomes all the more pronounced, though now with an unmistakable hint of fresh strawberries in the background.Whether combusted or vaporized, Bruce Banner Feminized delights with her sweet, fresh and predominantly fruity flavors. The aftertaste combines juicy berries with peppery spice, lingering on the palate for hours.The smoke itself is surprisingly smooth and palatable, giving no indication of just how potent this pot tends to be. Hence, taking things slowly with those first few hits is essential.EffectsBruce Banner isnâ€™t the kind of strain you reach for when looking for a gentle, relaxing and short-lived high. If anything, this is the kind of strain you reach for when you want to test your tolerance.Peaking at 27% THC or more, just two or three heavy hits of this pot and youâ€™re guaranteed an unforgettable ride.Sheâ€™s a slightly Sativa-leaning hybrid, which (true to her genetic composition) delivers a primarily cerebral high. The immediate sensation is one of overwhelming optimism and energy - often to such an extent as you wonâ€™t know what to do with it.Bruce Banner Feminized takes creativity and inspiration to highs youâ€™ve never known, though again can be so punchy youâ€™re not quite sure what to do with yourself. Frantic conversation and uncontrollable giggles are to be expected, meaning this marijuana isnâ€™t what youâ€™d call a productivity strain for formal settings.Still, invite a few friends over to indulge and this stuff can be a simply spectacular social strain.In any case, youâ€™ll need to plan ahead for the heavy and borderline incapacitating body stone that follows. Bruce Banner Feminized has a tendency to numb the body in its entirety, leading to an extensive bout of enjoyable couch-lock. The high has a tendency to last for as long as 3 to 5 hours, making this one to save for afternoons and evenings when your calendar is clear.As for the munchies, consider the calorie intake of the real Incredible Hulk in the average day and thatâ€™s probably what youâ€™ll have consumed by the time you come back down.Medical Uses of Bruce Banner FeminizedBruce Banner Fem may be ridiculously powerful, but the beautifully balanced genetic composition makes her a surprisingly versatile strain. Medical cannabis patients looking to treat relatively severe physical and psychological conditions have reported welcome and long-lasting relief from carefully measured consumption.The Sativa side of the high is great for getting to work on depression, anxiety, stress and mood disorders, replacing every trace of negativity with a feeling of total optimism and self-confidence.Bruce Bannerâ€™s associations with relentless episodes of the munchies can also make this stuff great for dealing with bouts of poor appetite.As the high progresses, the Indica genetics take over. The feeling of pure blissful contentment continues throughout, though is coupled with a deeply relaxing and enjoyably heavy body stone that makes its way through the extremities. Couch-lock isnâ€™t necessarily guaranteed, but youâ€™ll have little drive or energy to do anything physical.The physically relaxing properties of Bruce Banner are great for getting to grips with all types of aches and pains, along with muscle spasms, headaches and migraines.Anyone with a low THC tolerance or a history of panic attacks should approach this cannabis with extreme caution, as this is one of the hardest-hitting hybrids money can buy.Growing Bruce Banner Feminized SeedsOpt for the feminized version of Bruce Banner and youâ€™re looking at a guaranteed bumper haul of exceptionally strong cannabis. With no problematic male plants in the mix, youâ€™ll be set for an all-female grow and the best possible harvest.Getting to grips with this hybrid means first ensuring youâ€™ve got the vertical space needed to cope with pretty towering plants. A crop of these beauties is therefore best kept outdoors where possible, allowing them to do their thing under the watch of Mother Nature.Bruce Banner Feminized is a relatively robust and resilient specimen, though performs best when treated to consistently warm Mediterranean-like weather conditions.Itâ€™s not like you need much of the stuff to have the desired effect, but this stuff nonetheless yields like itâ€™s a competition. Even with moderately decent cultivation conditions, yields often top 25oz of weed for every square meter of grow space. If you manage to hit that magical 27% THC mark, youâ€™ll be sitting on a pretty spectacular stockpile for some time to come.Bruce Banner is definitely a strain that rewards knowledge, experience and effort, but is also forgiving enough for amateurs to get to grips with. That is, just as long as youâ€™re fortunate enough to live somewhere with decent and relatively predictable weather conditions outdoors.SummaryIrrespective of what kind of weed youâ€™re into and why you use it, itâ€™s impossible not to be impressed by Bruce Banner Feminized. If youâ€™re all about the cerebral side of getting high, this stuff is just about as powerful and enjoyable as it gets. If youâ€™re more about the physical side of things, these buds relax and incapacitate to just the right extent.Despite having been produced primarily with potency in mind, Bruce Banner also turned out to be one of the most fantastically fragrant and decadently delicious strains of recent years.Gorgeous to look at, relatively easy to grow and capable of delivering a serious punch, seriouslyâ€¦ what more could you realistically ask for?  Cannabis affects everyone differently. Your experience with this strain may not be the same as someone elseâ€™s. Growing conditionsâ€”including light, nutrients, and pot sizeâ€”play a major role in shaping the plantâ€™s yield, potency, and flavor profile. Results will always vary based on how and where itâ€™s grown.

A Hard-Hitting Herb Thatâ€™s More Heaven than HellBud BasicsAlso known asHellâ€™s FireorHellâ€™s Fire OG,Hellfire OG Feminizedis a killer-combo of undeniably potent genetics and flavors, borne of the classicOG Kushand crossed with the delicious (and sturdy)SFV OG Kushto create a hard-hitting strain that will smash through the mind and body of even the most seasoned veterans.Averaging at 20% THC levels, this strain can go right up to 29%, so itâ€™s no wonder that sheâ€™s known for her unparalleled euphoric bliss and sedating body-buzz - products of her minty green, highly resinous buds.Full of sophisticated flavor,Hellfire OG Femis an aromatic blend of lemon, pine, and spicy herbal notes that burn into a smooth smoke with a lingering diesel-like aftertaste.Mind-clearing and relaxing, this ganja can brighten your mood and boost your creativity by honing your focus and filling you with new motivation. However, take advantage of this while you can, since once the body-stone creeps up, youâ€™ll be so wrapped up inHellfire OGâ€™s warm embrace that you wonâ€™t want to get up and go so much as lay back and chill.These potent effects are contributing factors to the immense therapeutic benefits of this strain, capable of easing physical pains and inflammations from such ailments as arthritis and migraines, whilst simultaneously psychologically soothing the symptoms of anxiety, stress and depression, lulling you into a blissful state of relaxation and finally, slumber.With a parent strain likeOG Kush, youâ€™d be forgiven for thinking this specimen would be difficult to rear - however, the artful blending withSFV OG Kushhas made her considerably easier to handle, meaning you can grow this strain at home with relative ease. Indoors is a better option, allowing you to better ensure sheâ€™s trimmed and topped to perfection, but 8 to 10 weeks of work is well worth the wait when she flowers into a hefty 400 grams of dense, resinous buds.Flavor and Fragrance of Hellfire OG FeminizedAlluring and sensual, the scent ofHellfire OG Femcan only be described as a fragrant blend of herbal and citrus notes thatâ€™s beautiful underpinned with a spicy Thai incense base.Once combusted, this spiciness intensifies and brings out the earthy, pine flavors in a smooth smoke that leaves a pungent diesel aftertaste.EffectsWell-balanced and hard-hitting,Hellfire OG Feminizedisnâ€™t a strain for the faint of heart, and her psychoactive effects will set in within moments of lighting up. Almost instantly, youâ€™ll find your mood improved and your mind set free to soar into euphoria.This brighter mood and â€˜tude might make you feel more sociable, or it might inspire you to retreat into a creative frenzy, giving you the focus and motivation you need to finish that painting, or write that song.Due to the relaxing body-stone that follows her cerebral head-high,Hellfire OGis a strain better saved for later on in the day, as youâ€™ll struggle to get much done once her slow-building Indica effects kick in. The body and mind will calm as one as this strain envelops you in a warm, comforting blanket of bliss before eventually lulling you to sleep.Because sheâ€™s a hard-hitting strain with up to 20% THC content, this isnâ€™t a strain recommended for new users as though delightful, she can be overwhelming. Higher doses ofHellfire OGcan trigger anxiety or heighten paranoia if not consumed responsibly.Medical Uses of Hellfire OG FeminizedThe long-lasting and potent psychoactive effects of this strain make her an excellent choice for easing the ailments of several psychological disorders, and a handful of physical conditions too.As a mood-boosting strain,Hellfire OG Femcontains anxiolytic and anti-depressant properties that are effective at alleviating the symptoms of anxiety, stress, depression, bipolar disorder and PTSD amongst others. Bud originsThe Big Bud strain was created in the US during the 1980s. It was genetically modified in the Netherlands before being brought back to its roots. This hybrid cannabis cultivar contains around 80% indica and 20% sativa genetics. It boasts up to 23% THC and under 1% CBD.The original Big Bud strain is a three-way cross between Afghani, Skunk #1, and Northern Lights. This autoflowering version contains additional ruderalis genetics that give it non-photoperiod traits.Big Bud won first place in the category of Best Indica at the 1989 High Times Cannabis Cup. Itâ€™s survived almost four decades in the 420 world, and itâ€™s not going anywhere soon.Growing Big Bud autoflower seedsItâ€™s relatively straightforward to grow big bud autoflower plants. These crops are suitable for indoor, outdoor, and greenhouse cultivation. We recommend opting for a controlled environment if youâ€™re after top-tier buds and increased autoflower yields.The primary requirement is to keep a stress-free environment, as this non-photoperiod strain doesnâ€™t have enough time to recover from errors. Ensure you select the right pot sizes, keep an eye on the water levels, and keep it safe from harsh weather and other external threats.Big Bud delivers medium-sized plants reaching an average height of four feet. They can stretch to around five feet in favorable outdoor conditions.True to its name, the buds are big and chunky. They boast an intense olive-green hue and a thick layer of resinous trichomes. Orange pistils and purple hairs add extra bag appeal. Add support to the branches during the later phases to account for the heavy weight of the nugs.What climate do these weed seeds prefer?Big Bud seeds thrive in most outdoor setups but prefer warm, dry, and sunny Mediterranean conditions. This hardy strain can withstand cooler climates due to its ruderalis genetics, but itâ€™s not ideal. Sufficient light is essential for development, and autos thrive with 18â€“24 hours daily.Indoors, a hydroponic setup paired with the Sea of Green (SOG) technique offers the best results. Organic soil is equally reliable and improves the terpene profile, leading to explosive flavors.These plants are resistant to pests and diseases. The only thing to be wary of is mold, which may form toward the end of the flowering stage due to bud density. Provide proper airflow to remove excess moisture and check your crops regularly for red flags.Avoid high-stress training like topping. Some light pruning may be necessary to facilitate airflow in the lower leaves. Remember that autoflowers donâ€™t have room to recover from mistakes due to the fast development times and require a stress-free environment at all times.Feeding Big Bud autoThe seedling phase doesnâ€™t require many nutrients, and a well-aerated, organic soil, coco coir, or perlite substrate with sufficient water is enough. Add some nitrogen during vegging, but lower it when flowering starts, and supplement with more phosphorus and potassium.Ensure not to overfeed your autoflower plants, as it will hurt their development. Here are the recommended NPK (nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium) ratios for each stage:Seedling: 2:1:2Vegetative: 10:5:5Pre-flowering: 10:10:5Flowering: 5:15:10Flowering & yieldsBig Bud autoflower seeds are non-photoperiod, which means the plants donâ€™t require a light cycle change to begin blooming.They automatically enter the flowering stage around 2â€“4 weeks after germination and remain there for 7â€“9 weeks. Big Bud auto typically completes its life cycle in around 11â€“13 weeks, allowing for multiple harvests a year.The Skunk #1 influence plays a part in the Big Bud autoflower yield. Indoor growers can collect 14â€“16 oz./mÂ² indoors, while outdoor cultivators can expect an average yield of 3â€“6 oz./plant.Experiencing the Big Bud strainThis hybrid marijuana strain comprises 80% indica and 20% sativa genetics. Like with other buds grown from mostly indica seeds, you primarily feel the effects in your body. A cerebral buzz is also on the cards due to the high THC content of around 23%.Thanks to its impressive resin levels and strong potency, Big Bud autoflower is suitable for making concentrates, extracts, and hashish.The strainâ€™s effects set in slowly, making it somewhat of a creeper. The trip begins with a heavy body stone that you can feel from top to bottom. Itâ€™s powerful and typically glues most users to the couch.A dose of cerebral euphoria hits you as well, boosting your mood and making you more creatively inclined. Tension leaves your limbs and joints, and total relaxation takes over before complete sedation sets in. Expect a night of deep sleep afterward.Big Bud is best suited to evenings or lazy days when you have nothing to do. The strain delivers a lazy, fun high that allows you to enjoy your favorite laid-back activities or a chill session with like-minded friends.Common but minor cannabis side effects like dry mouth and eyes are expected, so stay hydrated, satiated, and use eye drops. Other reactions like nausea, dizziness, paranoia, or anxiety may accompany overconsumption, so toke in moderation and regulate your doses.Aroma and flavorThe Afghani and Skunk #1 heritage is clear in the flavor of this strain. Big Bud cannabis seeds produce buds with an array of terpenes, including caryophyllene and humulene.These compounds offer spicy, peppery, clove-like and earthy, herbal, and woody smells, respectively. Thereâ€™s also a fruity undertone in the mix.When toked, these nugs emit a similar flavor, filling your mouth with notes of wood, earth, spice, and a slight grape aftertaste. You might even be teased with a hint of citrus and pine.Helps withApart from its recreational effects, Big Bud reportedly also holds therapeutic value. According to some users, these nugs may offer relief from a range of mental and physical conditions.Its relaxing and sedating properties could assist with insomnia, stress, tension, and anxiety. The uplifting effects might relieve depression and creativity blocks. The presence of caryophyllene offers purported benefits for pain and inflammation.Consuming Big Bud could also ease conditions like fibromyalgia, muscle spasms, arthritis, appetite loss, nausea, and chronic pain.Buy Big Bud autoflower at Seed SupremeAre you ready to grow buckets of buds? Berry-Sweet Sativa for Soaring Cerebral EffectsBud BasicsAn unusual strain for many reasons, Skywalker Feminized is the Sativa-leaning hybrid result of breedingMazar, a famous landrace strainfrom the north of Afghanistan, and Blueberry, a highly-regarded, fruity Indica masterpiece.How and why their resultant love child tends more toward Sativa traits and effects is a mystery, but no one in the cannabis community could argue that this weed is anything short of delicious, dank and potent.As you can imagine, weâ€™re not looking too closely for an answer.Named Skywalker for reasons unknown, weâ€™ve decided that the profound buzz of this ganja is too similar to the sound of a lightsaber to ignore - but by all means, draw your own conclusions.What we can say for certain is this pot takes her deliciously fruity aroma from her Blueberry parentage, and when broken apart, the scent released by these buds is beyond comparison.Of course, this herbtruly shines when toked. Theintensity gradually increases until your mind is overwhelmed with euphoric sensations, positivity pushing out stress and worry as these buds workto lift your mood and free your mind.As you acclimatize to the cerebral effects of this weed, the body-stone kicks in, spreading a deeply physical sense of calm throughout your body and inspiring your most sloth-like qualities.Though unlikely to lead to couchlock in moderate doses, weâ€™d still suggest you clear your schedule of anything strenuous or active after a joint of this ganja. Seasoned smokers will handle this weed fairly well, but newbies might find themselves falling asleep fairly quickly.Still, there are always side effects to marijuana consumption - usually dry eyes and cottonmouth, which can be alleviated with plenty of hydration. In this case, higher doses can lead to headaches, dizziness, paranoia and increased anxiety, especially in novice smokers or those with a low tolerance to THC.Medical Uses of Skywalker FeminizedBlissful and euphoric, Skywalker Feminized is over-burdened with healing and therapeutic properties that can be incredibly useful as a medical strain. For patients in the medicinal marijuana (MMJ) community seeking relief and reprieve from psychological ailments, these buds areideal for uplifting the mind and ushering out intrusive negativity, particularly for those suffering from stress, anxiety, depression, bipolar disorder or PTSD.As a physical herb, the Indica side of this strain can function as an analgesic and anti-inflammatory and can alleviate the pain of such conditions as migraines, arthritis, muscle spasms and more.Like most marijuanastrains, Skywalker Fem can induce some serious hunger pangs with her munchies effect. Thiscan be beneficial to those suffering from lack of appetite as a side effect of eating disorders, chemotherapy or HIV/AIDS, due to the nausea-preventing anti-emetic properties of this weed.Deeply sedating, the tranquilizing and muscle-relaxing effects of this herb can be effective at sending even those with a high tolerance for THC to sleep, and as such can work wonders for those with insomnia seeking deep, restorative slumber.Growing Skywalker Feminized SeedsModerately sized marijuana, Skywalker Feminized can reach heights of around 90 centimeters when grown indoors, and stretch as far as 150 centimeters when grown al fresco. This meansthat her brawny branches are suitable for most properly equipped grow rooms.With lush and gorgeous foliage of broad, vivid green leaves, her sturdy limbs require no additional support as she grows, even as her colas get heavier as she matures. Thethick leafage of these plants does mean that some pruning is required to remove excess leaves and side branches, however, tooptimize light exposure and airflow.Skywalker Fem will thrive whether you choose to grow her in a hydroponics setup (for explosive growth) or in organic soil (to boost her terpene profile, and thereby her flavor and aroma). Either way, keep the temperature controlled at between 21Â° and 26Â°C, in a relatively dry environment.Since outdoor conditions are more difficult to control and prone to fluctuations, we recommend cultivating this cannabis indoors, as the management of this herbâ€™s climate is crucial, particularly during the 9 to 10 weeks in which sheâ€™s flowering.Additionally, indoor growers can more easily utilize a Sea of Green (SOG) setup, which can boost yields up to a considerable 400 grams per square meter and make better use of the available space.Should outdoor cultivation be your only viable option, then try to opt for warm and sunny climates such as the Mediterranean, California or Australia. In the northern hemisphere, these nugs are ready for harvesting around the middle of October, and you should find yourself with a tasty yield of around 500 grams per plant.SummarySmall and sturdy, Skywalker Feminized is a high-yielding strain bred from two deliciouslydivine Indicas, that somehow ended up being Sativa-heavy. Perfect for a nighttime strain, her dessert-like berry flavors hide a seriously potent 21% THC content thatâ€™s capable of providing soaring cerebral effects, clearing the mind, honing the focus and stoning the body right down to the couch.Heavy-hitting as she is, this marijuanamakes a great choice for the MMJ tokerswhen seeking an all-natural (and supremelytasty)alternative to traditionally prescribed medications. No trellising or support is required as these plants are strong enough to hold their own weight, and all-fem seeds remove the risk of pollination. Anything But ForgettableBud BasicsA consistently tricky strain to get hold of, Amnesia Purple is a beautifully colorful hybrid that leans heavily towards the Indica side of the scale - a fantastic strain for evening use when your calendar is pretty much clear.The exact origins of this mauve marijuana arenâ€™t clear, but what we do know is that this stuff often tests for a THC content of more than 20%.Thereâ€™s a very slight hint of Sativa to the effects, but not to such an extent as to dull or dilute any physical impact. Not Your Typical Cup of CoffeeBud BasicsProof that you canâ€™t always judge a book by its cover, Bubba Kush Auto has a fragrance and flavor profile that completely contradict her effects. By a considerable margin, this strain is one of the most notorious on the market for bringing on insatiable cases of the munchies.Medical Uses of Bubba Kush AutoflowerFor the most part, the medical benefits of Bubba Kush lean towards the physical side of the equation.This stuff has become a go-to strain for medical cannabis patients seeking relief from a wide variety of chronic pain conditions, along with muscle spasms, joint stiffness, arthritis and so on.The way in which Bubba Kush Auto gets to work with a numbing effect on the body makes this one of the most effective strains on the market for pain relief.Of course, the fact that this pot pretty much guarantees an excellent nightâ€™s sleep also makes it great for tackling the occasional bout of insomnia. Of course, youâ€™ll need to be careful if your tolerance to THC is low - thereâ€™s a notable amount of THC in these buds, so consume responsibly.Loaded up with all the potent analgesic, anti-inflammatory, anxiolytic, anti-depressant and anti-emetic agents that have made marijuana a medical marvel,Chocolope Kushdelivers relief to an array of physical and mental conditions - while also being one of the tastiest treatments anyone could ask for.The euphoric serotonin-fueled state of mind these buds bring on almost immediately has proven to be a reliably effective means of relieving stress, anxiety anddepression- whether mild or more severe cases.Malaise and any negativity, in general, fails to hold its purchase on us when under the influence ofChocolope x Kush, and patients suffering from the likes of PTSD, bipolar disorder and ADHD can also feel a tremendous benefit from these buds.Mild and severe physical aches and pains can also be effectively muted by this cannabis, though the effect is not quite so swift as the cerebral stimulation - donâ€™t expect instant relief here. Nevertheless, the likes of everything from headaches to migraines, arthritis, muscle spasms, eye pressure or backaches prove no match when this stuff really kicks in.The munchies which hit in the later stages ofChocolope x Kush Feminizedâ€™shigh are powerful enough to overturn nausea of restore a lack of appetite in a great many patients, and when all is said and done, even insomnia will struggle to keep you awake as a rejuvenating nightâ€™s sleep beckons.Growing Chocolope x Kush Feminized SeedsThere is some discrepancy on whether this hybrid tips the scales in favor of Sativa or Indica genetics, however, there can be no doubt that growingChocolope x Kush Feminizedis a largely Indica experience - one even novice growers can get on famously with.In true Indica fashion, these plants tend to remain short and stocky, rarely reaching more than 1 meter tall even in optimal conditions. Our Lady of Taste and EuphoriaBud BasicsA strain apart from her peers,Gelato Feminizedstands in a league of her own for taste and experience before you even begin digging into her background - but her lineage holds pretty high bragging rights.Amongst the many hybrids that have grown increasingly more popular in the last few years, few can compare to the ancestors ofGelato- bred from parent strainsThin Mint CookieandSunset Sherbet, she also shares genetics with classics such asCherry Pie,Durban PoisonandOG Kush.Since her direct parentage combines a complex terpene profile of berries, candy and citrus with skunk notes with a particularly beautiful purple and blue phenotype of GSC,Gelato Femwas always going to be a looker and a keeper.Blending genetics well known for their heavy-hitting body highs, this fruity hybridis as you might expect - a euphoric surge followed by a full on, couch-locked stone.Perfect for recreation and a variety of medicinal uses, sheâ€™s a simple strain to grow, too - with all-fem seeds, you can expect a healthy yield with minimum effort as you cultivate.Flavor and Fragrance of GelatoItâ€™s not possible to have such deliciously tasty ancestry and not inherit those genes - and as you might expect,Gelatois no exception. Sheâ€™s a complex blend of exoticisms, combining berries, sherbet and an orange citrus tang with the earthier tastes of lavender and mint to create an incomparable flavor profile.But the delicacies donâ€™t end there - exhaling will bring yet more flavors to the table, filling the mouth with a sweet (one might say, cookie-esque), piney aftertaste.SinceGelato Feminizedcan be a particularly pungent strain when properly cured, sheâ€™s not particularly discreet. Despite the facade of sweetness and innocence associated with her name, with a THC level that hovers around 25%, sheâ€™s a hit of satisfaction - but be wary not to overdo it. At around this time, that earlier motivation will dissipate, and youâ€™re likely to find laziness creeping in to take its place.As previously stated, an experience withGelatois not for newbies, and can be intense even for veteran consumers, combining a sociable cheeriness with a buzzing head high. But this can soon turn inward into a more isolated, introspective high once the accompanying physical effects take hold, and couch-lock is more than likely in most who smoke a joint of this lady.Still, sheâ€™s not without side effects, and like many strains you might find yourself with red, dry eyes, cottonmouth or dizziness if you donâ€™t stay hydrated when enjoying these marijuana delights. Headaches, some anxiety and paranoia are also a possibility if you consume her in higher doses.Medical Uses of Gelato FeminizedAside from the recreational uses ofGelato Feminized, she also embodies many of the medical talents of her genetic lineage. As such, sheâ€™s potentially a godsend for a variety of ailments when considering that somewhere in her ancestry is the legendary landraceDurban Poison- one of the best medical strains ever grown.Gelatocan be used with great success as a natural painkiller, for the temporary relief of symptoms of arthritis, managing migraines orchronic pain.Given the uplifting high that comes with a toke or two of this stuff,you might expect that stresses would melt away as theyâ€™re replaced by a euphoric buzz that clears the mind. However, some studies have also shown that this bud beauty can be used to treat the symptoms of anxiety, due to the presence ofanxiolyticproperties.Appetite stimulation is yet another medicinal benefit of a joint of this ganja gem, as extreme cases of the munchies are a side effect of her psychoactive delights. As such, sheâ€™s popular with those managing eating disorders or those suffering from lack of appetite as a side effect of medication or chemotherapy, particularly as this strain may relieve feelings of nausea and sickness.Growing Gelato FeminizedOnce upon a time,Gelatohad something of a reputation for being difficult to grow - but no more. With feminized seeds, what once required a deal of time and energy is now simple to cultivate with only a basic level of expertise, and with a stable, all female crop assured, thereâ€™s no stopping you.GrowingGelato Femin organic soil is a classic choice, as itâ€™s known for bringing out the very best terpene profile in her, which is a surefire way to produce a gorgeously aromatic plant. Do make sure to provide the plants with 600 watts of LED/HPS, too.The Sea of Green (SOG) method is an ever-popular and effective approach to Gelato Feminized, which can also withstand bothLST(Low Stress Training) andHST(High Stress Training).If youâ€™re looking to create a little bag appeal, exposing the plants to lower temperatures during the dark cycle (before flowering starts) will nicely stimulate the production of anthocyanin pigments - and youâ€™ve guessed it, this will bring out the beautiful mauves and purples that make for such a stunning plant.Gelatois ever a stinky sort of strain, and once her flowers begin to mature sheâ€™ll get particularly pungent - odor control measures are highly recommended if youâ€™re growing indoors, as youâ€™ll struggle to grow the plants discreetly otherwise.In 8 to 9 weeks, you can expectGelato Feminizedâ€™s buds to fully develop, provided that youâ€™re using a 12/12 light cycle. When harvested around mid-October, you can expect around 21 ounces of buds per plant - nice!SummaryAfter years of development and breeding between some of the very best strains available, itâ€™s no wonder thatGelato Feminizedemerged as a top contender at the end of it all. Sheâ€™s got bags of fruity flavor, smooth creamy smoke and levels of THC that canâ€™t be argued with - and she can be yours too.Easy to grow with all-fem seeds, you can expect to enjoy a decent yield in just 8 to 9 weeks with minimum effort - and one tokewill leave you floating on a cerebral high, wrapped in a blanket of warm, body-buzzing intensity in no time at all.Perfect for an evening socializing, a solo afternoon of introspection, or for alleviating symptoms of a variety of physical and mental ailments, sheâ€™s the strain for any veteran consumer who wants to try something that will tickle their taste buds whilst expanding their mind. strain_name: Northern Dawn Feminized Cannabis Seeds - Homegrown Cannabis Co.
about_info: Meet the luminous offspring of two legendary strains, Northern Lights #10 and Amnesia Haze. The result? A stellar hybrid with a cosmic THC level of 33%. Yes, 33%. Sheâ€™s tasty, sheâ€™s high-yielding, sheâ€™s great for beginners. But 33%? This is where we drop the mic.Bud BasicsLight up Northern Dawn and you're setting sail on a sensory odyssey unlike any other. The high is a masterful mix, where the serene, earthy whispers of Northern Lights #10 meet the electrifying, citrusy spark of Amnesia Haze.The terpene profile is a complex symphony, led by caryophyllene and limonene, crafting an aromatic landscape rich with sweet pine and sharp citrus hints, grounding you in nature while lifting your spirits. Itâ€™s pure pleasure, amplified by the astronomical THC level and balanced through the terps.Growing Northern Dawn Feminized SeedsThis strain marries the tranquil, fast-flowering prowess of Northern Lights #10 (sheâ€™ll flower in 8 - 10 weeks) with the vigorous, cerebral heights of Amnesia Haze, creating a growing experience as unique as its effects.Indoors, Northern Dawn Feminized Seeds demands a stable environment and a watchful eye on humidity, especially during the dense flowering phase, to prevent any mold issues. Sheâ€™s a bit of a space hog, needing room to stretch both vertically and horizontally, making her well-suited for growers with big tents.Outdoors, she flourishes in a sunny, Mediterranean-like climate, reaching her full, glorious potential. While not the easiest plant to grow,Northern Dawn Feminized rewards the dedicated cultivator with (up to) 19 oz per m2 of aromatic, resinous buds that capture the essence of both parent strains. And, in case you missed it, 33% THC.  Cannabis affects everyone differently. Your experience with this strain may not be the same as someone elseâ€™s. An Upbeat High with a Sweet, Sedating TwistBud BasicsThe origins ofHawaii x Purple Skunk Feminizedare pretty easy to work out on one side of her lineage, but on the other, all we know is sheâ€™s the lovechild of some tasty strains and a mysterious, heavy-hitting Indica that gives this plant her gorgeous frosty coating of trichomes.Named for her more well-known Sativa parents,Hawaii x Purple Skunk Femboasts both theHawaiianlandrace strain and the oh-so-intensePurple Skunkin her lineage, and does a damn fine job of combining their effects and flavors.Distinctive and pungent, the scent of this ganja will hit you hard - at first merely skunky, with that almost damp earthiness. But this hybrid is more complex than that, and her flavor and aroma both contain the sweet, chocolate notes of her parentage. These tastes and flavors blend together beautifully to bring out the tropical, citrus notes of the strain, making her particularly pleasing and hard to resist.Leaning heavily on her Sativa side,Hawaii x Purple Skunkâ€™s high begins in the head, clearing the mind to make way for a euphoric buzz that both hones in your focus and calms your worries. Once sheâ€™s set in nicely, this night-time favorite 20% THC strain will have your body melting into a puddle of numb, fuzzy jelly - enveloping your body in a comfort blanket that wraps you up and sedates you right down into sleep.This exact sedation is what makesHawaii x Purple Skunk Fema great strain for sufferers of chronic pain or insomnia, capable of softening and soothing the body while that uplifting euphoria eases worries and stress.Growing this strain is almost as simple as it gets for experienced cultivators - and not too hard on those just dipping their toes, either. Hardy, resilient and small in stature, keeping the environment optimal is key with this stuff, but feminized seeds do half of the job for you and youâ€™ll get a healthy yield of 450 grams per square meter in just 8-9 weeks.Flavor and Fragrance of Hawaii x Purple Skunk FeminizedDelighting the senses,Hawaii x Purple Skunk Femblends the tastes and scents of her lineage, exuding the earthiness ofPurple Skunkalongside the sweetness ofHawaiianto create a somewhat chocolatey combination thatâ€™s undeniably delicious.Make no mistake, this is a fairly pungent plant, both when growing and when combusted, and as such, sheâ€™s not the subtlest of marijuana strains. However, the skunkiness of her scent is offset with a mild, citrus, tropical note that is likely to lure you in regardless.EffectsHawaii x Purple Skunk Feminizedis much like any potent Indica hybrid strain, combining the euphoric buzz of a head-high with a sedating body-stone.Youâ€™ll find the head high comes first, though. Lifting the spirit and boosting your mood,Hawaii x Purple Skunkwill clear your mind from worry and strife, and usher in a joyful, relaxed feeling instead. This mind-clearing effect can sometimes enhance concentration, allow you to lock onto ideas and tasks and pursue them to completion. This, combined with the invigorating energy boost the strain provides, can make this stuff particularly motivating.Once this has set in, and your brain is fully buzzing with euphoria, your body will begin to follow suit. Calming and softening until even the tensest and tightest of muscles have loosened, soothing and numbing you from head to toe.Hawaii x Purple Skunk Femâ€™s profound relaxing properties will soon pull you down into a lazy, chilled out couch-lock thatâ€™s likely to intensify into drowsiness and slumber before you know it.Since sheâ€™s a THC-heavy strain,Hawaii x Purple Skunk- like most strains - can lead to adverse side effects if not consumed responsibly, and as such we recommend that those with a low THC tolerance or newcomers proceed with caution. Adverse effects include dry mouth, dry eyes, and occasionally (in more extreme cases) heightened anxiety, paranoia and dizziness.Medical Uses of Hawaii x Purple Skunk FeminizedAs a high THC strain, the numbing and sedating effects ofHawaii x Purple Skunkcombined with the uplifting, head-highs she provides, make her a particularly useful strain for medicinal marijuana users.The mood-boosting euphoric nature of this strain makes for an upbeat feeling that alleviates stress and some adverse symptoms of anxiety and depression.As an Indica-dominant hybrid strain, the sedating qualities of these buds make for a natural analgesic choice for those suffering from chronic pains. The innate anti-inflammatory properties of the strain also serve to ease and soothe aches and pains in place of traditionally prescribed opioids - without the long term side effects.Those struggling with insomnia may benefit from the drowsiness that a joint ofHawaii x Purple Skunk Feminizedcan bring, taking you right from fatigue to a night of deep sleep in no time.Growing Hawaii x Purple Skunk FeminizedGrowing Hawaii x Purple Skunk Feminizedis a fairly routine job for those familiar with cannabis cultivation. Sheâ€™ll grow well in a soil-freehydroponicsenvironment - but since consumers love the complex terpene profile of hybrid strains, weâ€™d recommended growing this gal in organic soil. To further enhance her growth rate, try supplementing this with heavy-duty 600-watt grow lamps.This specimen is naturally fairly small, rarely reaching more than 90cm - though she has a lot of lateral branches. Compact and resilient,Hawaii x Purple Skunkcan hold her own against mildew and mold - all you have to do is trim and prune her regularly, particularly around the lower parts of the plant. This will ensure your plants get the circulation of air and light that they needs to thrive.Maintaining these plants at a semi-humid temperature of between 21Â° and 26Â°C is essential, and will help to boost the quality and size of your final harvest - which takes around 8 to 9 weeks. After this, these gorgeous, purple, torpedo-like buds can be harvested for a prodigious yield of up to 450 grams per square meter indoors, and around 500 grams per plant outdoors.It has to be noted, this is a particularly pungent strain - even when sheâ€™s still growing. If youâ€™re growingHawaii x Purple Skunk Femand are trying to be in any way subtle, then a high-quality odor-filtration system is recommended to keep things under wraps.SummaryBlending the very best traits of her Sativa-heavy parentage on one side with a mystery Indica strain,Hawaii x Purple Skunk Feminizedpresents a balance of flavor, fragrance and effects thatâ€™s unmissable when sheâ€™s just so simple to grow, too.Sweet and chocolatey to the tastebuds, and pungent with a skunky earthiness in aroma, this combination surprisingly mixes to bring out sharp, tropical citrus notes that further enhance the delicious flavors of this strain.Hard-hitting as a head high and hard-hitting as a body-high, this hybrid is a one-two punch that wipes the mind of worry by uplifting you into euphoria, before sweeping you gently back down to a body-stone that couch-locks and sets your snoring even as she soothes and loosens your muscles.These heavy recreational effects can be utilized for the therapeutic benefit of consumers, easing the mind and body from stress, depression and chronic pain with just one joint.GrowingHawaii x Purple Skunk Femis straightforward even for the rookies, as she takes good care of herself - hardy enough to withstand most mildews and molds. With a little trimming and pruning to optimize airflow, in 8 to 9 weeks you can expect a healthy yield of 450 grams indoors, and up to 500 grams outdoors.  Cannabis affects everyone differently. Your experience with this strain may not be the same as someone elseâ€™s. Growing conditionsâ€”including light, nutrients, and pot sizeâ€”play a major role in shaping the plantâ€™s yield, potency, and flavor profile. Results will always vary based on how and where itâ€™s grown.

Sticky Sweet Strawberry SynergyBud BasicsWith award-winning, flavorful heritage, itâ€™s hard to find a downside to Strawberry Kush Feminized, bred from cannabis legends Strawberry Cough and OG Kush. A well-loved hybrid strain, this herb is potent at 21% THC, and thanks to her flavor and scent, one of the sweetest, tastiest strains available.Indica-dominant, the first impression youâ€™ll get of this pot is her sugary, aromatic berry fragrance. Mixed with the earthy musk notes of Kush, Strawberry Kush is grounded from being too sweet, but has a lingering strawberry aftertaste thatâ€™s hard to pass up.That freshness is carried over into her effects, where youâ€™ll experience a perfect synergy of cerebral effects and a relaxing body stone that work together to lift the mood, energize the mind and calm the limbs.Feminized strains are always simpler to grow, but Strawberry Kush Fem is particularly fuss-free and easy to manage, even for beginners. Thriving in any substrate, she requires little in the way of maintenance beyond some trimming of her bushy stature to ensure adequate ventilation and the best yields. Speaking of, theseharvests are huge, especially for a medium-sized strain, and without males in the batch, youâ€™re on to a winner.Flavor and Fragrance of Strawberry Kush FeminizedBeautifully blending a musk-like, herbal note of Kush with her namesake fragrance of sweet berries, Strawberry Kush Feminized a favorite of cannabis connoisseurs worldwide for her sugary aroma and lingering strawberry taste.EffectsCombining mental stimulation with a physical body effect, Strawberry Kush Fem is the perfect smoke for after a workout, synergizing her effects across the mind and body to provide a euphoric, cerebral high that heightens the senses into action. Colors brighten andsounds sharpen, all without overwhelming or causing lethargy and drowsiness.With Strawberry Cough as a parent, itâ€™s no surprise to those in the know that this weed is uplifting and invigorating, boosting mood instantly to improve your outlook and usher out intrusive, negative thoughts.The energizing effect these budsinducecan bring on fits of the giggles or wake up your inner chatterbox. Naturally, this makesthis herb great for social occasions and sharing with friends, particularly if youâ€™re the shy sort.Unlike her famous parent, Strawberry Kush is mostly Indica, and therefore her physical effects are more pronounced. Washing away tension in the muscles, easing tightness and ushering in a calm and relaxed state, this weed soothes the body without inducing heaviness. strain_name: White Widow x California Snow Autoflower
about_info: Cold as IceBud BasicsWhite Widow will undoubtedly go down in history as one of the most epic and important cannabis strains of all time. California Snow having been named after herfantastically frosty buds, which somehow bring even more visual appeal to the star-studdedWidow genes.This hybridwas never going to be anything but a success story in the making. The result of which is a gentle yet enjoyable burst of cerebral stimulation, coupled with a warm and relaxing body stone that makes for hours of blissful contentment.A fantastic session smoke that leverages the appeal of both parent strains, White Widow x California Snow Autofloweris a true crowd-pleaser in the making. From relaxed social situations to lazy evenings on the couch to weekends spent out and about in the great outdoors, thereâ€™s nowhere this herb isnâ€™t right at home.Sealing the deal, she'salso a seriously simple strain to grow at home, which isnâ€™t going to bite your head off for the occasional mistake. Toss your seeds in some quality soil, keep them adequately watered and a few weeks down the line youâ€™ll be looking at generous harvests of super sticky bud, having invested no real-time or effort whatsoever.Flavor and Fragrance of White Widow x California Snow AutoflowerOcimene and limonene are the two most prominent terpenes in this aromatic strain, which come together to produce something far more than the sum of its parts.Perfectly combining the enviable aromas of both parent strains, White Widow x California Snow entices with an earthy-fruity fragrance thatâ€™s hard to resist. Nevertheless, strains like White Widow x California Snow Auto illustrate how potency alone really isnâ€™t everything. Particularly when looking for an enjoyable session smoke you can hit all night, this pot is pretty much unbeatable.The Sativa-heavy genetics of the strain get to work instantaneously, combining a burst of energy with inspired thinking and a sense of complete confidence.You suddenly find yourself looking at the world in its entirety from a more positive perspective, while riding a tidal wave of motivation and all-round optimism. Youâ€™ll also want to talk about nothing and everything (all at once) with anyone in the vicinity, or brainstorm the avalanche of ideas that flood your mind.Give things an hour or so and the Indica side of the strain makes its presence known, though not merely on the kind of level thatâ€™s going to incapacitate you. Itâ€™s more a case of warming and soothing physical relaxation making its way through the body, replacing the initial â€˜get up and goâ€™ attitude with contented bone idleness.Youâ€™re unlikely to be glued to the couch unless you take things to extremes, which is why White Widow x California Snow is such a fantastic smoke to enjoy hour after hour.Though itâ€™s worth noting that the tail-end of the high does get a little sleepy, so itâ€™s probably best to hold out until the late afternoon at the earliest.Medical Uses of White Widow x California Snow AutoflowerA comparatively modest THC content in the region of 15% is more or less the sweet spot for therapeutic cannabis. More often than not, medical weed users arenâ€™t out to blast themselves into kingdom come, simply for the sake of it. White Widow x California Snow Autoflowerhas a long list of potential therapeutic applications, which go beyond paralyzing the body and brain with biblical quantities of THC.The predominantly Sativa genetics of the strain make for a fantastic choice for dealing with mild to moderate mood disorders. Everyday bouts of stress, depression, anxiety and pessimism are quickly and effectively eliminated, as is procrastination and apathy.Pull yourself out of whatever rut youâ€™ve found yourself in with just a few generous tokes and set yourself up for a few hours of pure enjoyment.Pain-related health issues can also respond well to balanced strains like this, which gently yet noticeably relax and soothe the muscles from head to toe. This herb lacks the raw power and punch to combat more severe or chronic physiological issues, but is nonetheless great for all types of everyday aches and pains.The sleepiness that creeps in towards the end of the high can also be great for addressing the occasional bout of insomnia.Growing White Widow x California Snow Autoflower SeedsThis is a durable and resilient strain that thrives in all types of climates, making her easy and forgiving to grow as a first-timer.Warm Mediterranean-like temperatures are ideal for producing the best possible results, but these beauties are still at home in cooler Northern European climates. Indoors or out, youâ€™ll rarely be looking at plants of more than 100cm in height, making this hybrid a fantastic choice where space is at a premium.As this is the autoflowering variant of the strain, your plants will automatically switch to the flowering stage when the time is right. This also reduces the amount of time needed to collect your haul â€“ just 10 weeks or so from seed to harvest being all it takes. Yields may be relatively moderate at around 2oz per plant, but itâ€™s still a decent result for such a fast and easy-to-grow specimen.Summary An outstanding new-generation hybrid with endless points of appeal, White Widow x California Snow Autoflower is everything a simple homegrown strain should be. Typically taking just 10 weeks to progress from seed to harvest, she's a compact and resilient specimen that averages around 15% THC.Along with being an exceptional session smoke, this herbhas a long list of therapeutic applications. Animal Runtz is a true reflection of its potent and fragrant genetic background. Luscious, sugar-tasting, and flavorful buds are your reward after a successful cultivation process. Growing this hybrid cultivar is better suited for slightly skilled hands.Read on to learn about the Animal Runtz feminized strain in detail. Discover its origin, growing demands, effects, flavors, and where to buy top-shelf seeds.Bud originThe strong ancestry of Animal Runtz is a delight to quality-seeking weed enthusiasts. A marriage between Animal Mints and Runtz birthed these hybrid weed seeds.Animal Mints is a perfect hybrid, boasting a 50:50 balance of indica and sativa. It offers relaxed, euphoric, and stress-relieving effects. It infuses notes of spicy, minty flavors into Animal Runtz.The fruity flavor of Runtz is strongly visible in Animal Runtz. The potent strain also infuses its energetic mental boost and physical relaxation properties.These feminized Animal Runtz cannabis seeds have photoperiod, all-female genetics. Expect 99% bud-bearing female crops when you cultivate them. Like its ancestors, the cultivar is a true hybrid that offers the best of both sativa and indica.Growing Animal Runtz feminized seedsFeminized Animal Runtz is a versatile strain. It thrives indoors, outdoors, and in a greenhouse setting. Itâ€™s very sensitive to environmental stressors, so it isnâ€™t beginner-friendly. While itâ€™s not the hardest strain to grow, itâ€™s slightly needy.Animal Runtz plants develop bushy and stocky structures. They thrive best under the touch of a grower skilled in training techniques. A large deal of effort, care, and strict maintenance culture is necessary.Feminized Animal Runtz flourishes most in soil. This strain also thrives in hydroponics, delivering faster and more potent yields. However, a hydro setup is skill intensive and has higher cost considerations. As such, itâ€™s not recommended for newbies.In all setups, itâ€™s best to germinate Animal Runtz feminized using the paper towel method. Itâ€™s straightforward and cheaper than other techniques. You only need paper towels, purified water, two plates, and tweezers. The Epitome of Enjoyable InebriationBud BasicsWhat would you expect from a cannabis strain with the fragrance of a freshly brewed cup of coffee? On the nose, this ganja gets to work with one of the most enchanting and enticing coffee-like fragrances of any strain out there. When consumed, she gets to work on the body like a freight train loaded with sledgehammers. Nevertheless, the way this stuff gets to work on the body would have you thinking youâ€™re looking at a pure Indica.Capable of knocking even the most seasoned stoners clean off their feet, this hybrid routinely tests for a THC content of up to 20%.Being the feminized version of Bubba Kush, potentially problematic male plants are eliminated from the equation with these beans. All without taking anything away from the quality or potency of the final specimen.Though predominantly famed for narcotic-like effects on the body, Bubba Kush Fem also brings just the right Sativa spike into the mix. After all, you wouldnâ€™t expect this combination of terpenes to produce a strain with a coffee-chocolate fragrance thatâ€™s impossible to resist.Coffee dominates on the nose, punctuated with rich dark chocolate and a hint of hashish. A burst of peppery spice is released when the buds are broken, further intensified when combusted with an even heavier hit of exotic hash.The smoke produced by Bubba Kush Feminized is rich, dense and satisfying, though rarely cough-inducing. The hash-like qualities are brought to the forefront when the buds are combusted, while the aftertaste combines creamy coffee, a hint of hazelnut and a touch of black pepper.Whether you prefer to smoke or vape your weed, youâ€™re into pretty much the same all-round sensory experience.Interestingly, this herb doesn't have the most powerful of fragrances in her raw form, making these buds comparatively easy to keep under wraps.Though the exact opposite is the case when the buds are burned - something to bear in mind if discretion is a priority.EffectsBubba Kush Feminized comprises 70% Indica and 30% Sativa genetics, painting a pretty clear picture of what to expect from the high. This strainâ€™s predominantly Indica lineage makes for a potent and powerful body stone, which comes on in minutes and lasts for hours.Before you know it, youâ€™re glued to the nearest piece of furniture in the vicinity, with no intention of moving for the duration.But what makes Bubba Kush Fem unique is the way in which she doesn't decimate the mind in the same way she hits the body.Couchlock is more or less inevitable, but you can expect to remain perfectly clear-headed and coherent throughout the entire experience.This stuffâ€™s not necessarily got the makings of a particularly social strain, but wonâ€™t leave you incapable of conversation if youâ€™re in company at the time. These buds are also known for bringing on wave after wave of inspired thinking and creativity - a firm favorite among artists, musicians and creative types in general.Sooner or later, the munchies creep into the equation and thereâ€™s nothing you can do to satisfy them.
