Hence, timing is everything with a good batch of Bubba Kush Feminized, as itâ€™s only a matter of time until youâ€™re offline for a good while.Medical Uses of Bubba Kush FeminizedBubba Kush is a pretty self-explanatory strain when it comes to medical applications. As a predominantly Indica strain, this stuff is just the thing to reach for where physical ailments are concerned.Therapeutic tokers worldwide recommend controlled intake of this cannabis for relief from arthritis, joint pains, muscle stiffness, muscle spasms and more. Sheâ€™s also a fantastic strain to turn to after a heavy workout, assisting with muscle repair and relaxation.Anyone struggling with occasional bouts of insomnia could find Bubba Kush Feminized just the ticket, which after a while guarantees a restful nightâ€™s sleep - all without the risk of fatigue and drowsiness the next day, which would be the norm with most conventional meds.Though predominantly physical in the effects department, this herb can also bring welcome relief from a wide variety of mood disorders and psychological malaise.Everyday stress, anxiety and general bad moods are quickly replaced with a sense of blissful contentment, which lingers throughout the experience. Patients with poor appetite could also find Bubba Kush Fem ideal, due to her connotations with relentless bouts of the munchies.While this hybrid doesn't have a particularly huge THC content, novice users are advised to approach with care and caution. Particularly those who may be prone to panic attacks or bouts of paranoia, for whom the sheer potency of the experience could be overwhelming.Growing Bubba Kush Feminized SeedsFor the most part, cultivating Bubba Kush Feminized is a famously easy and stress-free experience from start to finish.With plants that rarely reach more than around 130cm or so in height, you donâ€™t need a great deal of space to let these beauties do their thing. Flowering times average between eight and 10 weeks, which would mean harvesting towards the beginning October when growing outdoors.These plants are resistant to most common plant pests and diseases, so donâ€™t need a great deal of TLC along the way. Minimal pruning is all thatâ€™s needed to help a crop of this cannabis along, after which youâ€™ll be looking at an average indoor yield of around 17oz of weed for every square meter of grow space.Careful drying and curing is essential with Bubba Kush Feminized, in order to bring out those irresistible coffee and chocolate fragrances.SummaryBubba Kush Feminized delivers the kind of all-round sensory experience youâ€™d expect from a world-class strain. Bursting with brilliant coffee and chocolate fragrances, the way this stuff gets to work on the body is no less than legendary. Though what sets this herb apart from many comparable Indica-heavy strains is its versatility.The creativity and clear-headedness that accompany the body stone make Bubba Kush an enjoyable recreational strain for relaxed afternoons and evenings. A Strain By Any Other Name Would Smell As SourBud BasicsKnown on the 420 scene by various names, Sour Diesel Feminized may also be referred to as Sour D or Sour Deez - but whatâ€™s in a name, really? Well actually, ole Shakey might have been wrong there, as the most well-known trait of this weed is her potent and pungent aroma, blending gasoline with a lemon twist to provide a surprisingly mouth-watering flavor.As potent in effects as she is in her fuel-like flavor, this Sativa-dominant hybrid strainis energizing and uplifting and impossible to dismiss for stoners who prefer their weed with a good kick. Which is guaranteed when you consider her THC content can reach up to 25%.A vigorous wake-and-bake of epic proportions, this mood-boosting marijuana can also work well as an evening strain for a night of socializing and is a choice recreational pot.Though little is known about this ganjaâ€™s origins, whatâ€™s suspected is based upon her distinct and unique aroma and taste, and the effects she has both for getting you high and as a medical strain. Probably a blend of Super Skunk and Chemdawg, Sour Diesel Femâ€™s citrus tang is a great option for those seeking reprieve from stress, anxiety and depression, as well as those suffering from fatigue and a variety of mild to moderate pain disorders.Fuss-free and feminized for your convenience, these beans and their cerebral highs can be cultivated with ease at home, requiring some vertical space and a warm and humid environment to thrive.Ganja growers will love this herb's sturdiness and ability to thrive indoors or out, regardless of how you choose to grow her. And (just between us), these generous yields are pretty damn impressive, too.Flavor and Fragrance of Sour Diesel FeminizedThe gasoline and diesel aroma for which Sour Diesel Feminized is named is likely due to the rumored Skunk in her genetics, as itâ€™s notably one of the most pungent and distinct scents on the 420 scene.Blending kerosene notes and a hint of herbs and spices into her fragrance, this weed becomes suddenly more sour and citrus-filled once combusted.Seasoned smokers adore the sour earth notes in the taste of this pot, underpinned by a subtle earthiness that becomes more fuel-like when exhaled. The flavors can be a little overpowering and strong on the first toke, but once youâ€™ve acclimatized, youâ€™ll find her aftertaste to be particularly mouthwatering in nature.EffectsA mostly Sativa strain, Sour Diesel Fem is still a well-balanced hybrid with some Indica oomph. Perfect as a wake-and-bake, this pot is also a choice strain for a night on the town with friends or social occasions that require a little more energy at the end of the day.The very definition of a happy high, sheâ€™s a popular recreational strain thanks to her stimulating and invigorating effects and is enjoyed by many creative types such as writers, artists and musicians for the motivation and innovation she provides.Thanks to her physical side, these energizing effects are grounded from being too overwhelming or from inducing hyperactivity and giddiness, as the calming edge of this cannabistempers that Sativa kick so you donâ€™t get too carried away.Still, thatâ€™s a whole lot of stimulation from one all-natural upper, since she clocks in at around 24% THC. New tokers should probably sit this one out and opt for a milder strain (unless you're feeling brave!).Of course, there are the usual uncomfortable additions of dry, red and bloodshot eyes and cottonmouth. Thankfully, thoseside effects of Sour Diesel Fem are easy enough to handle with OTC eye drops and plenty of water to keep you hydrated during your session.More adverse effects can come on from over-consuming this herb though, and can lead to headaches, dizziness, heightened anxiety and increased paranoia in those with low-THC sensitivity. Keeping it low and slow can help, but if not, switch to another strain.Medical Uses of Sour Diesel FeminizedAn all-natural alternative to traditionally prescribed medication for both mental ailments and pain relief, Sour Diesel Feminized is popular amongst the medicinal marijuana (MMJ) communityfor the treatment of both, thanks to her high THC content and uplifting Sativa side.As this herb's effects include an energizing effect alongside an ability to improve mood and positive outlook, Sour Diesel Fem can be a potent relief for those struggling with everyday worries, stress, anxiety and low mood and depression.Her cerebral effect is enlivening and uplifting enough to swiftly remove feelings of negativity and intrusive thoughts while allowing you the energy to go about your day productively.Sour Diesel also happens to contain analgesic and anti-inflammatory qualities that make her popular amongst patients seeking organic relief from chronic pain. For those suffering from headaches and migraines, joint pains and arthritis or PMS, this weed can reduce inflammation and temporarily kill pain.As an additional side effect of the potent munchies effect of this pot, those having problems with lack of appetite from chemotherapy or eating disorders can benefit from this herb, as her antiemetic properties can soothe nausea and vomiting.Growing Sour Diesel Feminized SeedsTall and slender, this elegant Sativa-dominant strain is fairly conical in shape, with thin leaves that lend her a festive look once her trichomes come in and she begins to glisten like frost. Such a sparkling appearance is due to the sheer volume of sticky trichomes this stuff produces, making her particularly difficult to break apart without a grinder to hand.Growing no more than 5 feet, sheâ€™s not the tallest strain youâ€™ll come across, but by no means the shortest either. CultivateSour Diesel Feminized indoors wherever possible for best results. Thisrequires a controlled set up to keep her environment warm and humid - and to ensure she gets the right level of support for her huge colas, once she really gets going.Sheâ€™ll do well enough in organic soil if youâ€™re looking to boost her terps (terpenes), but to really boost her growth, pair hydroponics with a Sea of Green (SOG) or Screen of Green (SCROG) technique to be pleasantly surprised come harvest time.Flowering for around 10 weeks, Sour Dieselâ€™s feminized seeds ensure that males and the risk of pollination in your batch are as minimal as possible, and all of the sticky 1.63 ounces per square foot youâ€™ll yield will be consumable.Outdoors, this strain is like most marijuana - a big fan of a warm Mediterranean climate with plenty of sun and a gentle breeze. In such an environment, she might grow as tall as 6 or 7 feet, though thatâ€™s less likely in the north, where harvest time will be around the last week of October.Growing Sour Diesel Feminized outdoors will require a little more maintenance, as the less control you have over her environment, the more at risk she is of molds and mildews developing. Still, sheâ€™ll reward you handsomely with around 24 ounces per plantof those super sticky nugs.SummarySince she was a child of the 80s and 90s, itâ€™s hard to fathom the mysterious origins of this herb beyond comparing her terps and flavors to other potential parent strains. But still, the cannabis community are agreed upon once thing: this ganja is a staple variety, not to be missed.Sour Diesel Feminized has been legendary for a while now, and for good reason. Her pungent aroma is instantly recognizable by its sour-lemon and gasoline notes which blend to create a surprisingly enticing toke. strain_name: Afghan Hawaiian x Laos x Jamaican

Bud originAlaskan Thunderfuck, also known as Matanuska Tundra and ATF, is a slow-acting, long-lasting, and relaxing strain. This variety of marijuana became famous after winning the Best CBD award at the 2011 High Times Medical Cannabis Cup in California.In the 1970s, cultivators crossed the indica Afghani with the sativa Northern California and a Russian ruderalis. Its dominant terpene, myrcene, promotes its talkative and uplifting effects.Growing Alaskan Thunderfuck feminized seedsAlaskan Thunderfuck seeds are moderately challenging to grow. The plants thrive outdoors and produce massive yields, but you can cultivate them inside if preferred. Prune regularly to remove dead branches and to allow the crops to spread outwards.Unfortunately, this strain isnâ€™t resistant to disease, so always look for signs of mold. Check for yellowing leaves or weakened branches. Keep the climate and feeding rituals balanced to protect your precious crops.To start the growing process, germinate your weed seeds indoors. They only need heat, air, and moisture to thrive in their early stages. Use clean paper towels dipped in fresh water. Gently fold the seeds into the towels and keep each one around an inch apart.Store your seed-filled napkins in a dark and warm spot to help them grow. They should sprout roots in around 1â€“5 days. Place them in indoor pots or outdoor soil when the taproots are around a quarter-inch long.What climate do these seeds prefer?These seeds thrive in cool to moderate climates. Keep the temperatures around 65â€“80Â°F. The plant is sensitive to changes in conditions, so ensure the perfect balance. Keep the shrubs about two feet apart so that each one can access sufficient vitamins.Flowering & yieldsThese plants take around 8â€“9 weeks to flower. The buds are medium to large and adorned with orange hairs and silky-white trichomes.Indoors, expect yields of around 16 oz./mÂ². Outdoors, expect a much larger output of around 32 oz./plant. The nugs are generally ready to harvest around October. ATF crops typically grow to about 6â€“7 feet tall.Experiencing the Alaskan Thunderfuck (ATF) strainAlaskan Thunderfuck is a sativa-heavy strain, with 60% sativa and 40% indica genetics. It has THC levels of 15â€“27% and CBD levels of 0â€“2%. Expect energetic, talkative, and uplifting effects. You begin to feel your senses alter, and your mental state calms down.
